onboarding.nav_content: Tap here to go back to the main screen anytime.
onboarding.weather_content: Monitor real-time weather conditions, forecasts, and alerts for your farming area.
onboarding.tabs_content: Switch between Crop Combos and AI Recommendations to explore different farming insights.
onboarding.combos_content: Explore proven crop combinations with investment details, ROI, and success rates.
onboarding.details_content: Tap any combo card to view complete details, advantages, challenges, and edit options.
onboarding.ai_content: Get personalized farming recommendations powered by AI based on your location and conditions.
onboarding.plan_content: Generate comprehensive farming plans tailored to your specific needs and conditions.

suicide.info_text: If you're having thoughts of suicide or need emotional support, these helplines are here to help you 24/7. All conversations are confidential and free of charge.
suicide.immediate_danger_notice: If you're in immediate danger, please call emergency services (100) or go to the nearest emergency room.

crisis_text.description: Text HOME to connect with a counselor

choice.title: Krishi Saarthi
choice.subtitle: action Mode
choice.help_text: Select 'Voice Pilot' to control the app with your voice, or 'Manual Mode' for traditional touch interaction.
choice.reset_message: Onboarding reset! Restart the app to see it again.
choice.onboarding.welcome_message: Let me show you around. This is your main hub for choosing how you want to interact with the AI assistant.
choice.onboarding.voice_message: Click here for hands-free voice interaction. Perfect when your hands are busy with farm work!
choice.onboarding.manual_message: Click here for text-based interaction. Choose this when you prefer typing or need quiet operation.
choice.onboarding.profile_message: Click here to view and edit your farmer profile, including your farm details and preferences.
choice.onboarding.market_message: Check current market prices for your crops to make informed selling decisions.
choice.onboarding.help_message: Click this help button anytime for quick tips and guidance on using the app.

voicechat.onboarding.welcome.title: Welcome to Chat Mode! 💬
voicechat.onboarding.welcome.message: This is where you can have detailed conversations with your AI farming assistant.
voicechat.onboarding.profile.title: Your Profile 👤
voicechat.onboarding.profile.message: Access your farmer profile and settings from here.
voicechat.onboarding.chat_history.title: Chat History 📝
voicechat.onboarding.chat_history.messag: View all your previous conversations and continue where you left off.

voicechat.onboarding.new_chat.message: Click here to start a fresh conversation anytime.
voicechat.onboarding.features.title: Quick Features 🚀
voicechat.onboarding.features.message: Access farming tools like weather, marketplace, cattle management, and more directly from here.
voicechat.onboarding.input.title: Type Your Questions ⌨️
voicechat.onboarding.input.message: Type your farming questions here. You can ask about crops, weather, diseases, or anything farm-related.
voicechat.onboarding.attachments.title: Add Files & Images 📎
voicechat.onboarding.attachments.message: Attach documents or images to get help with crop diseases, documents, or visual analysis.
voicechat.onboarding.home.title: Return Home 🏠
voicechat.onboarding.home.message: Use this button to go back to the main screen and choose between voice or chat modes.

documentagent.title: Document Agent
documentagent.greeting: Hello! I'm here to help you with any documentation needs. What can I assist you with today?
documentagent.clarifying: Perfect! I'll help you complete that form step by step. Do you have the form with you, or should I create a new one?
documentagent.collecting_name: Great. Let me start by getting your full name. Take your time.
documentagent.collecting_address: Thank you. Now, what's your current address or village name?
documentagent.processing: Excellent. I'm now processing your information and preparing the document...
